creator: Fortune App Studio
descriptionHtml:
“Blend Me Photo Editor” is application with concept of “Photo Blender Mixup” + “Blend Collage” editor with bokeh effect. This app allows you to select your pic from gallery and apply bokeh effect on picture. App support Unlimited Photo Blender & photo mixer.

Blend me photo editor contains lot of background images which can make your photo more beautiful.

Adjust Fade and your photo to create an amazing output.

The Perfect App to create BLENDING photo in the most CREATIVE way. Blend your photos in a very creative way! You can blend two Photos together. Blender Camera Blends photos with effects and frames.

1) Blend Collage
You look like a star with this new features and you can edit your pictures using photo filter, blur backgrounds, lightness, contrast, hue, saturation, sharpen and many more options.

2) Mirror Photo Editor & Collage
With mirror photo editor & collage you create MirrorPic. Using mirror photo effect and you also repeat your pictures inside Mirror Effect.

3) Blend Camera
Blender camera supports images combiner so you will create double exposure camera effect on live camera preview. Take smart auto beautify selfie with selfie camera expert.

4) Photo Color Filter
This color filter is support auto beautify features to make your photo more effective. There is wide range of new filters available for your selfie photos & edited images.

5) Sticker Text and many more
sticker photo editor you will add some cool stickers from our updated sticker collection. Using Sticker maker you can make your own sticker with custom text over your pic. Write best quotes on pictures with photo text editor on an image in a sticker. Now you can customize font style, color, size and add unlimited funny stickers to your photo.

This app allows you to select your pic from gallery and apply bokeh effect on picture. App support unlimited photo blend at same time. You can also mix multiple picture and apply lighting bokeh effect on pic.

Now create amazing photo by mixing two images together by using Blend me photo editor application. Blend image on another image to make a awesome design.

Photo Mixer is a Photo editing, cropping, add text, latest photo collage maker easy to make photo grid.photo blender are used to create one or more photo mixer to create amazing photo.

Reflection Effects allows you to make mirror effect to a picture. You can cut your photos into different shapes like hexagon, rectangle, circle and much more.

With Mirror Photo, you can do more than just mirror effect photo, this app also contains several frequent use photo editing tools.

Blend Me Photo Editor - Photo Collage Frames & Mirror Effects is an application with concept of photo blender mixup using effect. This app allows you to take or select pic from gallery and apply effect on picture.

Mirror Effects is an awesome mirror effects app which will let you select your photo and apply various mirror effects including 3D mirror effects.

You can create photo grids and photo collages, Mirror Image Photo Editor provides you a great collage maker tool, which will let you to create beautiful photo collages and photo grids.

Blend me photo editor contains lot of background images which can make your photo more beautiful and combination design.

Key Features Of Blend Me Photo Editor

1) Blend Me Photo Blender

2) Mirrior Photo Editor

3) Profile Photo Editor

4) PIp Photo Collage Editor

How to use:-

- Select photo from gallery or capture it from mobile camera.

- Resize picture and move to create image of different proportions.

- Adjust Blend Level or which Photo need to be on top of another.

- Blend two pictures quickly and easily

- Adjust Brightness, opacity And Contrast of photo.

- Add different types of stickers and text on your photo.

- Save and set wallpaper and share with your friends and family.
descriptionShort: Adjust Fade and your photo to create an amazing output.
title: Blend Me Photo Editor, Photo Blender & Mirror Pic
